channel.title: Longcovid on Dr. Mowinckel's
channel.description: Recent content in Longcovid on Dr. Mowinckel's

item.title: The difficult year
item.description: A deeply personal reflection on a challenging year with long COVID, highlighting the journey through illness, rehab, support from loved ones, and small victories. Despite physical limitations, resilience shines through monthly blog updates, a newsletter, and plans for gradual recovery in the coming year.
